column4: Please help.  I cannot connect to localhost on Karmic... I have messed things up with both /etc/apache2 and also with xampp install
same error "Url not found at this server"
what port is your apache running on ?
The problem is I have two set ups running, I think?
what do you mean by 2 setups?
I had apache2 running in /etc....   messed with it and then installed xampp
Ah hah!  that's cool.  Reference to both postgresand to mysqld but no ref to apache
aolserver is running as is proftpd
gundtbert: aolserver is running as is proftpd
apache might run on different port. you have to check the configuration. I don't remember which file
